recipeIngredientRows.ingredientName: BC VEG BOCA PATTY CUT PREP
recipeIngredientRows.purchaseProductName: BC VEG BOCA PATTY CUT PREP
CHEESE, SWISS SLICED .75 OZ 3.5  TWIN PACK REF
PICKLE, DILL KOSHER CHIP 3/16" PLASTIC REF

recipeMethods.stepInstructions:
1. Whisk together Creole mustard and mayo in a mixing bowl until 
combined.

2. Place in squeeze bottles for service.

3. Hold at 41°F or below.

Hot Sandwich:

1. Ensure impinger oven is turned on to 500°F and belt speed is set to 1
minute, 20 seconds.

2. Squeeze 1 tbsp Creole mayo, evenly, onto a rye bread slice.

3. Place pre-cut Boca patty on top of mayo.

4. Place 2 Swiss cheese slices on top of patty.

5. Place bottom half of prepared sandwich a second rye bread slice on a 
screen. Run through the impinger to toast, 1 minute 20 seconds.

6. Remove screen from impinger.

7. Place 2 pickle slices on top of melted Swiss cheese.

8. Squeeze 1 tbsp Creole mayo evenly on the other rye bread slice. 
Place this piece of bread on top of other half of prepared sandwich to 
close.

9. Wrap sandwich in paper or place in to-go container. Serve.


Cold Sandwich:

1. Ensure impinger oven is turned on to 500°F and belt speed is set to 1
minute 20 seconds.

2. Place 2 rye bread slices on a screen and run through the 
impinger to toast.

3. Remove bread from impinger.

4. Squeeze 1 tbsp Creole mayo evenly onto each toasted bread slice.

5. Place pre-cut Boca patty on top of one bread slice.

6. Place 2 Swiss cheese slices on top of patty.

7. Place 2 pickle slices on top of Swiss cheese.

8. Place the other bread slice on top of prepared sandwich to close.

9. Wrap sandwich in paper or place in to-go container. Serve.
